summary.name: Sony Playstation 5
summary.description: The Sony Playstation 5 is the 5th release in Sony Interactive Entertainment's line of video game console's 'Playstation' , the console comes with many high fidelity features making it Sony's most powerful console yet.

overview.name: Advanced Chemical Company
overview.description: (From Website) Since 1972, Advanced Chemical Company’s high-grade precious metals refining capabilities in thermal reduction and chemical refining have been unmatched worldwide. We combine meticulous handling techniques, knowledgeable staff, and state-of-the-art processing to relentlessly pursue the greatest yields for our refining partners.

overview.name: China Tin Group Co., Ltd
overview.description: (From Bloomberg) China Tin Group Company Limited mainly explores, mines, smelts and processes tin metal ores. The Company's main products include tin ingot, zinc, antimony ingot, indium ingot, lead ingot,silver ingot and other non-ferrous metal products.

location.address: China, Guangxi, Liuzhou, Chengzhong District, Liuzhou, 桂中大道华锡大厦
